extendedInfo.description: Channels Television,one of Africa's leading TV Stations,launches an app for android device owners.Channels Television launches Channels Mobile for Androids.Channels Mobile for Androids help you stay connected to the news where ever you are. Channels Mobile for Androids brings the news even closer to your fingertips. View headlines across sections, watch our live feeds and even contribute on our various social media platforms.Never miss an important news headline with the Channels Mobile for Androids.channelstv, channelstv Nigeria, Channels Television, channels tv, channels tv Nigeria, Channels Television, Channels Mobile for Androidstv channels,tv channels online,com.channelstv.channels.mobile,channelstv, channelstv Nigeria, Channels Television, channels tv, channels tv Nigeria, Channels Televisionchannelstv, channelstv Nigeria, Channels Television, channels tv, channels tv Nigeria, Channels Televisionchannelstv, channelstv Nigeria, Channels Television, channels tv, channels tv Nigeria, Channels Televisionchannelstv, channelstv Nigeria, Channels Television, channels tv, channels tv Nigeria, Channels TelevisionChannels Mobile for Androids, channelstv, channelstv Nigeria, Channels Television

reviews.title: Best Nigerian news station
reviews.comment: A very good news app. Initially working but now always crashing once I lunch the app. Update please.
reviews.author: Saheed Oyewale

reviews.title: Nice app but...
reviews.comment: Very cool app I must say but I would have loved it more if it broadcasted same programmes as the regular tv station. I wish I could watch late night movies here.
reviews.author: Tee Show

reviews.title: Nice work indeed
reviews.comment: Channels TV has actually created a reputation in the Nigerian media with their news coverage covering all platforms, from satellite to mobile, terrestrial to digital, space and beyond. Watch out in the years to come, Channels TV will strive to match CNN and BBC in digital technology. Can\'t wait for channels tv to go from terrestrial broadcasting to digital for they have conquered the mobile world.
reviews.author: Akinnawo Babatope

reviews.title: Channels for real.
reviews.comment: Waoh, this is cool and lovely from Channels for those of us that love information. With this you don\'t need BBC or CNN. You deserve best TV station of the Decade.
reviews.author: Saheed Adewale Ahmed

reviews.title: Excellent and innovative
reviews.comment: 5 stars, well because it\'s channels :) and it\'s good to see innovation. It does a very basic job of bringing the news to your fingertips and does it well.  The app could do with some more features though, especially a breaking news notification (and some user settings maybe)
reviews.author: Shikamaru Kuchiki

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Keep it up we need more of it.
reviews.author: Ibrahim Mohammed

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: This is really good, never knew Nigerian apps are as good as this. Thumbs up!
reviews.author: Olawale Atanda

reviews.title: God is good
reviews.comment: Nice and good
reviews.author: Ebety Usoko

reviews.title: Channel tv
reviews.comment: It nice to get this, bcos its no easy t get news even on motion
reviews.author: Sulaimon Oluwaseun

reviews.title: Superb!
reviews.comment: Watching live news has been made a whole lot easier! I love this app
reviews.author: agbi joan

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: I believe in channels. Really working well on my S3
reviews.author: Dennis Okiemute

reviews.title: Ok but frequent crashes
reviews.comment: Frequent crash with the error message \"connection cannot be made to the server\" even when the data link is excellent. Otherwise, the news about Nigeria it offers is timely and accurate.
reviews.author: Yemi Adebisi

reviews.title: I love it!
reviews.comment: A very nice application... especially watching it live
reviews.author: henry max

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: It was ggood b4 bt now wast please upgrade
reviews.author: Majente Onos

reviews.title: Fantastic!!
reviews.comment: I have been looking for this for a while now. Really very happy as now I can watch and hear unbiased reviews on important issues for once in our lovely country Nigeria.
reviews.author: Ibikunle Roluga

reviews.title: good
reviews.comment: very nice station
reviews.author: musaab mohammed

reviews.comment: Best television station in my country Nigeria. Great app, please keep it up.\tApp works great
reviews.author: Omotola Abdul-Latif

reviews.title: Crashes!
reviews.comment: I\'d rate if it had run perfectly, sadly it didn\'t work! Keeps crashing!!!!
reviews.author: Mohammed-Faosy Adeniran

reviews.title: Lovely
reviews.comment: This is owesome, i love this app now i can get all the news update i want.
reviews.author: Roy Zacson

reviews.title: I\'m surprised  !!!!
reviews.comment: I\'d checked it in the past and was disappointed. Downloaded it again  and it actually WORKS LIVE. PICTURE quality needs improvement though. I would like to watch movies too.
reviews.author: adegbenro agoro
